MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH39 postcode area of North Berwick. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4.45pm to repair a fault on our underground cable network on Melbourne Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.16pm on Tuesday 1st of December 2020.
